title: OTAs Are Underway
description:
Laura and the NFL Live Crew discuss who is and isn’t at their teams OTAs, Russell Wilson’s comments on returning to Seattle Week 1, Ron Rivera’s Endorsement of Carson Wentz, Belichick’s comments on offensive responsibilities, and the QB competition in Pittsburgh starts. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Who has and hasn't shown up at OTAs this week and the QB battle starts in Pittsburgh.
